songs.title: Get Up
songs.lyrics:
Don't be afraid
Who can do you any harm
Your debts are paid
You are resting in my arms

If storms are blowing
Don't be afraid
- Cause my perfect love
Will drive out the fear
My saving power
Will shine on you, like the sunrise

Get up, get up
And make a stand
Get up, get up
And take my hand

Come to me
I will give you rest
You will be free
When you're learning to my chest

Don't be afraid
Who can do you any harm
Your debts are paid
You are resting in my arms
